author: SteveL-MSFT
body: HelpSystem code is currently in SMA.dll, it should really be a separate module so that non-interactive use, for example, doesn't need to pull it in.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: Should we move the HelpSystem in new namespace "Microsoft.PowerShell.HelpSystem" and new folder with the same name?

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: We should think through the impact to reduce compatibility issues.  cc @PowerShell/area-helpsystem

title: HelpSystem should be a separate module outside of the engine
